label: 伊藤博文
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
説明文: (1841-1909). Also: Shunsuke. Choshu loyalist; son of a farmer turned castle-town merchant. Student of Yoshida Shoin. Made samurai, 1863. With Inoue Kaoru, studied in London, 1863-64. Led a shotai, working with Takasugi Shinsaku, 1865. As Western" expert and colleague of Kido Koin, rose steadily in Meiji government, becoming Prime Minister and Genro."
